metadata.title: PaperStation Browser - Modern browser for knowledge management
metadata.description: PaperStation Browser is a modern browser built on Electron+Chromium, featuring knowledge capture, smart summarization, and structured export.

hero.title: Knowledge Management, Smart Browsing
hero.subtitle: PaperStation Browser is a modern browser built on Electron+Chromium, featuring knowledge capture, smart summarization, and structured export.

features.title: Core Features
features.subtitle: Professional browser for knowledge workers
features.subtitle2: More than a browser, your knowledge assistant
features.subtitle3: Three core features to transform fragmented browsing into systematic knowledge

capture.title: Knowledge Capture
capture.description: One-click capture of web content, supporting text, images, links and more

summary.title: Smart Summarization
summary.description: AI-powered smart summarization to quickly extract core content from articles

export.title: Structured Export
export.description: Export to Markdown, PDF, Word and other formats

mainFeatures.title: Knowledge Capture
mainFeatures.description: Automatically extract key information while browsing, intelligently categorize and establish logical connections between knowledge points, all data stored locally to ensure privacy and security.

mainFeatures.title: Smart Summarization
mainFeatures.description: Generate core content summaries with one click, automatically extract 5 key points, 3 key term explanations, and 2 practical application cases.

mainFeatures.title: Structured Export
mainFeatures.description: Support export to PDF, HTML and other formats, automatically generate directory navigation and beautiful layout, support multiple customizable templates.

subFeatures.title: ChickRubGo Search
subFeatures.description: Integrated localized search engine, better suited for Chinese users

subFeatures.title: Fast Launch
subFeatures.description: Optimized launch speed, open browser in seconds

subFeatures.title: Bookmark Management
subFeatures.description: Convenient bookmark management and quick access

subFeatures.title: Dark Mode
subFeatures.description: Built-in dark mode to protect your eyes

subFeatures.title: Keyboard Shortcuts
subFeatures.description: Rich keyboard shortcuts support, improve operation efficiency

download.title: Knowledge Management, One Click Away
download.description: Download PaperStation Browser to experience a modern browsing experience with knowledge capture, smart summarization, and structured export, making knowledge management within reach.

contribute.title: Contribute
contribute.subtitle: Build a better browser together
contribute.description: PaperStation Browser is an open source project. Welcome to contribute code, report issues, and make suggestions.

downloadPage.title: Download PaperStation Browser
downloadPage.subtitle: Version 1.1.5 - Choose the version for your system
downloadPage.unknownSystemDesc: Your operating system may not be supported, but you can still download packages for other systems
downloadPage.windowsInstall3: 3. Follow the installation wizard to complete
downloadPage.windowsInstall4: 4. Run from desktop or start menu
downloadPage.macosInstall2: 2. Double-click .dmg file to open disk image
downloadPage.linuxInstall4: 4. Or install using snap: sudo snap install
downloadPage.communityDesc: Based on Flowmora Browser, welcome to submit Issues and Pull Requests

language.title: Select Language
language.subtitle: Choose your preferred language
language.requestLanguageDesc: Want more language support? Send us an email to request!

tab1.title: Smooth Tab Management
tab1.description: Easily manage multiple tabs, switch efficiently, and enhance browsing experience

tab2.title: Rich Settings Options
tab2.description: Personalize your browser experience to meet your various needs

comparison.title: Feature Comparison
comparison.subtitle: PaperStation Browser vs Chrome Feature Comparison
